name: AboveGroundPlacement
title: Above Ground Placement
description: Above Ground Placement codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: A pool structure that sits entirely above the ground surface, typically with walls extending upward from ground level.
A pool structure that is fully excavated and installed below ground level, with the pool rim at or near ground surface.
A pool structure that is partially excavated, with part of the pool below ground level and part above, combining features of both above ground and in ground pools.
